task.title: Installing lerna
task.shortdesc: lerna is a CLI to manage monorepo structures of JS-based projects. It can be installed using npm.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that you have node and npm installed on your machine.

step.cmd: Run npm install -g lerna in your command line
step.steptroubleshooting: If you get error messages regarding insufficient permissions on the file system on Linux or macOS, try to re-run the command using sudo.
